restaurants_bars.name: Bleacher Bar
restaurants_bars.description: Offers a unique view of the field from under the bleachers. It's a popular gathering spot for Red Sox fans.

restaurants_bars.name: Game On
restaurants_bars.description: Huge, bustling sports bar & pizzeria at Fenway Park offers a game room, DJs & dancing nights.

restaurants_bars.name: Yard House
restaurants_bars.description: High-end sports-bar chain with a huge menu of New American fare & an extensive list of draft beers.

accommodations.name: Hotel Commonwealth
accommodations.description: Upscale, modern rooms & suites in a posh hotel offering dining options & a gym, plus free Wi-Fi. It's just a short walk from Fenway Park.

accommodations.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Back Bay/Fenway
accommodations.description: Polished extended-stay hotel with modern rooms, free Wi-Fi & breakfast, plus a rooftop bar and within walking distance to Fenway Park.

tourist_attractions.name: The Freedom Trail
tourist_attractions.description: Famous 2.5 miles long path through downtown Boston. It passes by 16 locations significant to the history of the United States.

tourist_attractions.name: Museum of Fine Arts
tourist_attractions.description: Fifth largest museum in America with more than 450,000 works of art. Located not far from Fenway Park.

team_related_activities.name: Fenway Park Tour
team_related_activities.description: Guided tour of the iconic Fenway park where you learn the history of the park and the Red Sox.

options.description: The MBTA Commuter Rail has a Fenway stop, which is walking distance from the park.
The Green Line 'D' Branch is the subway that serves the Fenway Park area.
There are many bus routes provided by the MBTA that pass nearby, including the 8, 19, 47, 55, 60, 65, and 8 route.
